name: project-team-dashboard-widgets
title: Project Team Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets for managing project teams. The set includes widgets for viewing and managing project team members.

widgets.name: Project Team
widgets.description: Displays a list of users who are members of a project team in Hub.

widgets.name: Revoke User Access
widgets.description: This widget lets you remove a user from all groups and teams where they are a member. It also lets you revoke your own project roles.
